original_title: Autour d'une femme dans un pavillon
overview: Author of the footage – Marcel Belanger – is terribly pleased to look at the face of his wife: that, in fact, is the plot, and who would argue. And so he watches her smile, and when she slips away, the camera lens stumbles upon garden gnomes, flowers, and bustle of the street.
title: Autour d'une femme dans un pavillon
